Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 103rd overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2015, off Edson Botella (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2015, hitting .375 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 6/5/2016 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/19/2016 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2017, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Traded from Colorado to Chicago on 7/31/2017 (Going to COL: P Eric Boyd, P Leandro Balan, P Floyd Alcantara. Going to CHI: LF Hilario Suazo)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/2/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $3,333,333 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Kansas City on 5/20/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2021, hitting .421 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/6/2023 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/17/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
